mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from data_privilege_group_member
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into data_privilege_group_member (group_id, member_type, member_id, username) values (#{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into data_privilege_group_member
group_id,
member_type,
member_id,
username,
#{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{memberType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update data_privilege_group_member
group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
member_type = #{memberType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into data_privilege_group_member (group_id, member_type, member_id, username) values
( #{item.groupId}, #{item.memberType}, #{item.memberId}, #{item.username} )
mapper.delete:
delete from data_privilege_group_member where
(group_id=#{item.groupId} and username=#{item.username})
mapper.insert: insert into data_privilege_group_member (group_id, member_type, member_id, username) select #{destGroupId}, member_type,member_id,username from data_privilege_group_member where group_id=#{srcGroupId};
mapper.select: select mem.username from data_privilege_group_mapping map1 join data_privilege_group_mapping map2 on map1.id=map2.parent_id and map2.group_id=#{groupId} join data_privilege_group_member mem on map1.group_id=mem.group_id
